title: Goods & chattels : the story of Theodor
creator_credit: Robert Voigt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Robert Voigt recounts his rich family history and their connection to their farm in Beechworth. When his father, Henry, purchased more land, he received, as part of the goods and chattels in the contract, Theodor, a farm labourer. Theodor was a man of vast intelligence and mysterious origins.
